name: UIAccessibility
desc: A namespace for accessibility symbols for UIKit apps.

items.name: static let announcementDidFinishNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system finishes reading an announcement.

items.name: static let assistiveTouchStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that indicates a change in the status of AssistiveTouch.

items.name: static let boldTextStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Bold Text setting changes.

items.name: static let buttonShapesEnabledStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Button Shapes setting changes.

items.name: static let closedCaptioningStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the setting for Closed Captions + SDH changes.

items.name: static let darkerSystemColorsStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Increase Contrast setting changes.

items.name: static let differentiateWithoutColorDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Differentiate Without Color setting changes.

items.name: static let onOffSwitchLabelsDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s On/Off Labels setting changes.

items.name: static let videoAutoplayStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Auto-Play Video Previews setting changes.

items.name: static let elementFocusedNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when an assistive app focuses on an accessibility element.

items.name: static let grayscaleStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Grayscale setting changes.

items.name: static let guidedAccessStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that indicates when a Guided Access session starts or ends.

items.name: static let hearingDevicePairedEarDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when there is a change to the currently paired hearing devices.

items.name: static var hearingDevicePairedEar: UIAccessibility.HearingDeviceEar
items.desc: The current pairing status of Made for iPhone hearing devices.

items.name: static let invertColorsStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the settings for inverted colors change.

items.name: static let monoAudioStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when system audio changes from stereo to mono.

items.name: static let prefersCrossFadeTransitionsStatusDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Prefer Cross-Fade Transitions setting changes.

items.name: static let reduceMotionStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Reduce Motion setting changes.

items.name: static let reduceTransparencyStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Reduce Transparency setting changes.

items.name: static let shakeToUndoDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system's Shake to Undo setting changes.

items.name: static let speakScreenStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Speak Screen setting changes.

items.name: static let speakSelectionStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Speak Selection setting changes.

items.name: static let switchControlStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Switch Control setting changes.

items.name: static let voiceOverStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that UIKit posts when VoiceOver starts or stops.

items.name: static func post(notification: UIAccessibility.Notification, argument: Any?)
items.desc: Posts a notification to assistive apps.

items.name: struct UIAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: An accessibility notification that an app can send.

items.name: static let announcementStringValueUserInfoKey: String
items.desc: The text of the announcement.

items.name: static let announcementWasSuccessfulUserInfoKey: String
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the announcement is successful.

items.name: static let focusedElementUserInfoKey: String
items.desc: The element currently in focus by the assistive app.

items.name: static let unfocusedElementUserInfoKey: String
items.desc: The element previously in focus by the assistive app.

items.name: static let assistiveTechnologyUserInfoKey: String
items.desc: The identifier of the assistive app.

items.name: static func requestGuidedAccessSession(enabled: Bool, completionHandler: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Transitions the app to or from Single App mode asynchronously.

items.name: static func configureForGuidedAccess(features: UIGuidedAccessAccessibilityFeature, enabled: Bool, completionHandler: (Bool, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Enables or disables the specified accessibility features while using Guided Access.

items.name: static func guidedAccessRestrictionState(forIdentifier: String) -> UIAccessibility.GuidedAccessRestrictionState
items.desc: Returns the restriction state for the specified guided access restriction.

items.name: enum UIAccessibility.GuidedAccessRestrictionState
items.desc: Constants that describe the state of a restriction, either allow or deny.

items.name: static func convertToScreenCoordinates(UIBezierPath, in: UIView) -> UIBezierPath
items.desc: Converts the specified path object to screen coordinates and returns a new path object with the results.

items.name: static func convertToScreenCoordinates(CGRect, in: UIView) -> CGRect
items.desc: Converts the specified rectangle from view coordinates to screen coordinates.

items.name: static func focusedElement(using: UIAccessibility.AssistiveTechnologyIdentifier?) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the accessibility element that is currently in focus by the specified assistive app.

items.name: static func registerGestureConflictWithZoom()
items.desc: Warns users that app-specific gestures conflict with the system-defined Zoom accessibility gestures.

items.name: static func zoomFocusChanged(zoomType: UIAccessibility.ZoomType, toFrame: CGRect, in: UIView)
items.desc: Notifies the system when the app’s focus changes to a new location.

items.name: static var isAssistiveTouchRunning: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether AssistiveTouch is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isBoldTextEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Bold Text setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isClosedCaptioningEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Closed Captions + SDH setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isDarkerSystemColorsEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Increase Contrast setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isGrayscaleEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Color Filters and the Grayscale settings are in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isGuidedAccessEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Guided Access setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isInvertColorsEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Classic Invert setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isMonoAudioEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Mono Audio setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isOnOffSwitchLabelsEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the On/Off Labels setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isReduceMotionEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Reduce Motion setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isReduceTransparencyEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Reduce Transparency setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isShakeToUndoEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Shake to Undo setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isSpeakScreenEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Speak Screen setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isSpeakSelectionEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Speak Selection setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isSwitchControlRunning: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Switch Control setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isVideoAutoplayEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Auto-Play Video Previews setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var isVoiceOverRunning: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether VoiceOver is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var shouldDifferentiateWithoutColor: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Differentiate Without Color setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var buttonShapesEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Button Shapes setting is in an enabled state.

items.name: static var prefersCrossFadeTransitions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Reduce Motion and the Prefer Cross-Fade Transitions settings are in an enabled state.

items.name: struct UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: Constants that describe how an accessibility element behaves.

items.name: struct UIAccessibility.AssistiveTechnologyIdentifier
items.desc: Identifiers for assistive apps.

items.name: struct UIAccessibility.HearingDeviceEar
items.desc: Constants that specify how a user is using a hearing device.

items.name: enum UIAccessibilityContainerType
items.desc: Constants that indicate the type of content in a data-based container.

items.name: enum UIAccessibilityNavigationStyle
items.desc: Constants that describe how to navigate an object’s elements with an assistive app.

items.name: enum UIAccessibilityScrollDirection
items.desc: The direction of a scrolling action.

items.name: enum UIAccessibility.ZoomType
items.desc: The types of system Zoom that can be in effect.

items.name: init(_reserved: UnsafeMutableRawPointer)
items.desc: Creates an accessibility structure.

items.name: struct UIAccessibility.GuidedAccessError
items.desc: A Guided Access error.

items.name: static let guidedAccessErrorDomain: String
items.desc: A string that identifies the Guided Access error domain.
